bug.author: LukeBolly
bug.summary: Asterisks in filenames prevents checkout in Windows environment
bug.description:
Many of the file names in: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepmind/dm_control/tree/master/dm_control/suite/dog_assets/extras>https://github.com/deepmind/dm_control/tree/master/dm_control/suite/dog_assets/extras</denchmark-link>
contain * symbols, which prevents Windows users from checking out the code. I know Windows is not officially supported, but it seems like up until now it has been possible to get the environment working with a little bit of effort. Is there any chance of renaming these files?

comments.comment: Yes, we can rename these files. Thanks for pointing out!
